item.title: 31 West Philly Illustrations
item.description: For Artclash’s 2017 West Philadelphia Fun-a-Day show, I drew 31 West Philadelphia-inspired illustrations, one each day through the month of January.

item.title: Hopscotch Coffee Illustration
item.description: 18" x 24" micron pen drawing for Hopscotch Coffee’s Bloomington, IN shop.

item.title: 31 Dream Homes
item.description: For Artclash’s 2012 West Philadelphia Fun-a-Day show, I drew 31 dream homes, one each day through the month of January.

item.title: Gull
item.description: A set of images for use by Nate Rappole as a postcard series.

item.title: TEDxPhilly
item.description: The organizers of TEDxPhilly contacted me to create a seam-less, infinitely tiling illustration to be used as a background image throughout the conference’s web collateral. The illustration is type-based and inspired by “the city,” the 2011 conference theme.

item.title: Battles
item.description: Battles: Sea and Land are two illustration-based narrative zines made in the Summer of 2006.

item.title: Clap Yr Hands
item.description: Clap Yr Hands is a zine I occasionally publish, usually featuring illustration and collage.

item.title: Taylor & Juliette
item.description: I created a simple brochure website and letter-pressed invite for Taylor & Juliette’s wedding. The website and invite feature original illustrations, as well as a hand-drawn typeface created for the wedding materials.

item.title: Anthroapology
item.description: This quarter-size zine is a collection of illustrations I made while living and teaching English in Bangkok, Thailand in 2005/2006.

item.title: Polaroid Celluloid
item.description: Hand drawn illustration for the zine Polaroid Celluloid.

item.title: 31 Portraits
item.description: For Artclash’s 2010 Fun-a-Day show, I drew 31 portraits, one for each day of the month of January. The illustrations were compiled in Anthrotopography, a small, photocopied zine.

item.title: 31 Patterns
item.description: Nate Johnson, Kara Schlindwein, and I collaborated on this book of 31 illustrated patterns for Artclash’s annual Fun-A-Day art show. We created one pattern each day throughout the month of January 2009 and compiled our finished work in a handmade book. The patterns are designed to tile infinitely.

item.title: Muscle Crap
item.description: A few of my illustrations were featured in Muscle Crap, a limited edition artists’ book published by Salt Tooth Press in 2004.
